gpii_pmt_settingsTables_genericPrefsInst: Generic preference settings are universal settings stored in Morphic that are not particular to specific products. They can potentially be applied to a wide range of products automatically
gpii_pmt_addPrefsSetDialog_inst:
Give the preference set a different name.

For example: Tired, Working, Bright, Noisy, School

Additionally, you can start with a blank set, or copy the initial settings from another preference set.
gpii_pmt_deletePrefsSetDialog_inst: Are you sure you want to delete this context?
gpii_pmt_addProductDialog_inst: Click below to add this product to the preferences safe.
gpii_pmt_removeProductDialog_inst: Are you sure want to completely remove the settings for this product from the preferences safe? Note: Removing a products settings from all Preference Sets will completely remove it from your safe
gpii_pmt_editPrefsSetDialog_inst: Below you can edit the internal id of the Preference Set, and it's human readable name
gpii_pmt_prefSettingAdjuster_nonActiveIn: Click a cell and it's information will appear here.
gpii_pmt_prefSettingAdjuster_missingSche: This setting is either lacking a schema, or using a schema not currently supported, defaulting to type 'string'
gpii_pmt_index_inst: Hello! This is a demo of the in-progress Power Preferences Tool. Use the box on the right to create a new Preferences Safe, or choose from an existing Preferences Safe below to start with. After editing the preferences, you can download the json file with your changes.
gpii_pmt_login_inst: This is a development and demo version of the PPT. To login and try out it's features you can use 'morphic' and 'gpii' as the username and password.
gpii_morphic_createSafe_inst:
Morphic does not recommend anonymous accounts.

Do NOT forget your Account Name or Password with an anonymous account.

If you forget either one, you will not be able to make changes to your preferences. You also will not be able to add any extra Keys.

If you don't want to worry about forgetting your sign-on information, considerSigning up another way.
gpii_morphic_createSafe_acceptTerms: I accept the Terms of use for MyMorphic
gpii_morphic_createSafe_accountNameReqs: Your Account Name has to be longer than 6 characters and must be unique.
gpii_morphic_createSafe_passwordReqs:
Your password protects your account and preferences from being viewed or changed by others. You must use a strong password.

If you want to create a stronger password, we recommend using an easy-to-remember phrase or sentence.
gpii_morphic_createSafe_termsOfUseReqs: In order to sign up for and use a MyMorphic account you need to accept the terms of use. It describes what data Morphic needs to provide auto-personalization and the purposes for which you may use the service.
